appetizers.name: Carrot Corn Soup
appetizers.description: Carrots, corn, onions, spices with a touch of cream.

appetizers.name: Vegetable Manchurian
appetizers.description: Vegetable croquets tossed in a tangy sauce, with a touch of soya sauce and scallions.

appetizers.name: Almond Crusted Shrimps
appetizers.description: Shrimps dipped in a batter made from chic-pea flour, almond light spices, golden fried.

entrees.name: Bharwan Mirch
entrees.description: Bell peppers stuffed with lightly spices mix of potatoes and paneer(cheese), topped with tikka masala sauce.

entrees.name: Garlic Chicken
entrees.description: Tandoori malai tikka pieces cooked with a touch of garlic, onions and green peppers.

entrees.name: Saffron Special Biryani
entrees.description: Lamb, shrimps and chicken cooked with aromatic basmati rice and spices.

entrees.name: Malbari Fish Curry
entrees.description: Tilapia fillet cooked in special curry with touch of fennel and tamarind.
